data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Sha Tin.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sha Tin, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 38,576 believers in the state of Sha Tin the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Spirit, please defend the 38,576 believers in Sha Tin against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sha Tin, Hong Kong that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 547,822 lost people in  Sha Tin, Hong Kong have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Sha Tin to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sha Tin, Hong Kong. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sha Tin, Hong Kong has a population of 630,300.

We estimate Sha Tin has 38,576 people who might know Jesus, 43,901 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 547,822 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
